mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CLASS JOIN EPISODE A USING (CLASS_NO) JOIN EP_SCHEDULE B USING (EP_NO) WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND EP_COUNT = 1
SELECT CLASS_NO, CLASS_NM FROM CLASS JOIN EPISODE A USING (CLASS_NO) JOIN EP_SCHEDULE B USING (EP_NO) WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND EP_COUNT = 1

SELECT c.class_no as class_no, e.ep_no as ep_no, e.EP_COUNT as ep_count, e.EP_ST AS DELETE_STATUS, NVL(ca.CAL_ST, -1) AS CAL_STATUS,
to_char(min(s.schdl_dt),'yyyymmdd') start_date, to_char(max(s.schdl_dt),'yyyymmdd') end_date
FROM CLASS c LEFT JOIN episode e on c.class_no = e.class_no LEFT JOIN ep_schedule s on e.ep_no = s.ep_no LEFT JOIN calculate ca on s.ep_no = ca.ep_no
WHERE ep_st != 4 and c.member_no = #{memberNo} group by c.class_no, e.ep_no, e.EP_COUNT, e.EP_ST, ca.CAL_ST, e.ep_st order by ep_no

select r.receipt_no RECEIPT_NO, c.class_nm CLASS_NM, m.member_nm TEACHER_NM, STUDENT_NM, cal_price PRICE, ca.cal_fin_no CAL_DATE from episode e join class c on (e.class_no = c.class_no) join member m on(c.member_no = m.member_no) join calculate ca on (e.ep_no = ca.ep_no) join receipt r on (ca.cal_no = r.cal_no) where e.ep_no = #{epNo}

select count(*) from ( SELECT e.ep_no, to_char(min(s.schdl_dt),'yyyymmdd') start_date, to_char(max(s.schdl_dt),'yyyymmdd') end_date FROM CLASS c LEFT JOIN episode e on c.class_no = e.class_no LEFT JOIN ep_schedule s on e.ep_no = s.ep_no WHERE e.ep_no = #{epNo} group by e.ep_no order by ep_no ) t where ( (select count(*) from register where ep_no = #{epNo}) = 0 and ( ( to_char(sysdate, 'yyyymmdd') >= t.start_date and to_char(sysdate, 'yyyymmdd') <= t.end_date ) or ( to_char(sysdate, 'yyyymmdd') <= t.start_date and to_char(sysdate, 'yyyymmdd') <= t.end_date ) ) )

SELECT DISTINCT C.CLASS_NO CLASS_NO, C.CLASS_NM CLASS_NM, E.EP_COUNT EP_COUNT, M.MEMBER_NO AS STUDENT_NO, M.MEMBER_NM AS STUDENT_NM, M.MEMBER_GENDER , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REGISTER RE LEFT JOIN REPORT RT ON (RE.REG_NO = RT.REG_NO) WHERE RE.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO and rt.report_no is not null) AS REPORT_COUNT
FROM EPISODE E LEFT JOIN REGISTER R ON (E.EP_NO = R.EP_NO) LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON (R.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO) LEFT JOIN REPORT RP ON (RP.REG_NO = R.REG_NO) LEFT JOIN CLASS C ON(E.CLASS_NO=C.CLASS_NO) WHERE E.EP_NO = #{epNo}
